com.rohanclan.cfml.parser
Class CFDocument

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.parser.CFDocument
public class CFDocument
extends java.lang.Object

CFDocument basically is the main element for getting information about the ColdFusion document. It will contain the entire tree for the document, including CFScript'd items. CFDocument is supposed to represent the document tree, variable list and whatever else for out-of-editor and in-editor documents. So it can be used for documents that the user is editing and for background loading a file (or files).

Field Detail

docRoot

public java.util.ArrayList docRoot
Deprecated. Use getDocumentRoot() to get the DocItem representing the root of the document

The root elements of the document. A CF document does NOT have to have a root element and so one is not inserted by default.

docVariables

public java.util.ArrayList docVariables
List of variables in the document. Not used at the moment.
